name: IEEEConferenceSuggester
0:
”Alexa, ask i. triple e. conference suggester to show me conferences about magnetism in New York”
”Alexa, ask i. triple e. conference suggester to show me conferences about power distribution lines”
”Alexa, ask i. triple e. conference suggester to show me conferences on September 21st, 2018”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i. triple e. conference suggester
des: The following skill is a demonstration of an IEEE conference suggestion engine, for IEEE members wondering about conferences they may attend during the coming months. The engine uses a list of conferences along with their topics and dates in the United States. A user can either search by a specific date, a specific month, a conference topic, or a state that a conference may be in. A user can also combine parameters, just as long as they are not a specific date and a month in one request.
